articles.author: Soumyadeep Sarkar
articles.title: Blue Origin, Boeing, and other American space companies get another shot at NASA's moon lander contract - The Tech Portal
articles.description: NASA has decided to give American companies other than SpaceX more opportunities to develop an astronaut moon lander.
articles.content: Nearly a year after NASA awarded SpaceX with the $2.9Bn Moon lander contract (which others did not take well), the agency has announced that other space companies such as Blue Origin and Boeing will … [+2002 chars]

articles.author: Kenneth Chang
articles.title: NASA Plans to Give SpaceX Some Company on the Moon - The New York Times
articles.description: The agency will seek bids for future lunar landing spacecraft from companies other than SpaceX, which won the first contract to return American astronauts to the moon.
articles.content:
Still, NASA has been making progress.
A giant rocket, the Space Launch System, is now finally at the launchpad at the Kennedy Space Center in Florida, although it will just sit there for now. Next m… [+1851 chars]
